hero.about: Known online as MrBartusek. I'm a Web Developer with passion and experience for building websites and web applications.

about.title: Passionate about creation
about.description: Known online as MrBartusek. I'm a Web Developer with passion and experience for building websites and web applications. I specialize in building backend using Node.js and TypeScript, as well as, frontend using React and TailwindCSS.

dokchat.name: DokChat
dokchat.description: DokChat is a comprehensive instant messaging app with group chats, attachments, GIFs, and a Desktop app. Supports customization of user profiles and colors of groups. Comes with DokChat Desktop - Electron desktop client

gif-picker-react.name: gif-picker-react
gif-picker-react.description: gif-picker-react is GIF picker component for React applications that features Tenor GIF search on and trending categories. Complete with state of the art customization

stocked-up.name: StockedUp
stocked-up.description: StockedUp is complete Inventory Management System that focuses on managing stock for large organizations. It makes managing vast amounts of inventory effortless.
